Title: Naked Sunshine Body Mist Spray 250 ML
Description: Bryan & Candy, New York’s Naked Sunshine Body Mist is a sensual feminine fragrance inspired by delicately poised peonies and silly Lilies. A perfect blend of rich White Musk, Hibiscus, Magnolia and Cassis. In a matter of moments, this fragrance will transform your mood towards the freshness valley with a variety of flowers.

Title: Urban Desire Body Mist Spray 250 ML
Description:
Quantity: 250 ML, Item Form: Spray
Body Mist with long aroma for whole day long. Safe to be sprayed directly on skin for long lasting freshness
Convenient travel friendly pack. Helps you to have aromatherapy on the go any time anywhere
Wrap yourself in the luxury of this irresistible scent and reveal your natural romantic self
Usage: Give it a good hard shake first to make sure all the ingredients are mixed together before you spray it. You should hold the can approximately 15cm from your body or clothes as you spray it.

Title: Urban Scandal Body Mist 250 ML
Description: Bryan and Candy Urban Desire Body Mist is a delightful blend of White Musk, Neroli, Rose and Black Currant. Bryan & Candy, New York’s Urban Desire Fragrance Mist will give you the essence of an abstract personality with wild living, full of desire, dreams, and fantasies. A fragrance that’ll help boost your lucid dream life.

Title: Tropical Fling Body Mist Spray 250 ML
Description: Bryan & Candy, New York’s Tropical Fling Body Mist is a sparkling and breezy fragrance with vibrant fruity-floral scent with clean and crisp elements of wild Orchids & Wormwood, which evokes the spirit of sun-kissed sand and beachy adventures. Bryan & Candy, Tropical Fling Fragrance Body Mist, gives you the confidence to slay with a look and steal someone’s heart with a smile.

Title: Wild Salsa Body Mist 250 ML
Description: Bryan & Candy’s Wild Salsa Fragrance Body Mist is an ecstatic like a bottle of sparkling champagne. A refreshing vibrant breezy smell infused with Lemon in the top note, Cassis and Lilies in the heart and Amber in the aquatic base note. Perfect to captivate attention at dance parties and to get red-carpet ready wildness.

Title: Floral Splash Body Mist 150ml
Description:
Exotic fragrance: Immerse yourself in the captivating fragrance of Floral Splash, with top notes of pear, cantaloupe, and mango that transport you to a tropical paradise.
Travel-friendly size: The Floral Splash Body Mist is available in a convenient travel size, perfect for on-the-go indulgence and freshness.
Succulent fruit blend: Experience the invigorating blend of succulent fruits in Floral Splash, enhanced by delicate floral undertones, creating a refreshing and captivating scent.
Revitalizing burst of fragrance: Spritz on Floral Splash Body Mist for a revitalizing burst of fragrance that leaves you feeling refreshed and enchanting throughout the day.
Nourishing and gentle: The Floral Splash Body Mist is formulated with ingredients that are gentle on the skin, providing a refreshing and hydrating experience.
Delicate floral undertones: Enjoy the subtle floral undertones in the fragrance of Floral Splash, adding a touch of elegance to the refreshing allure.
Cruelty-free: Our Floral Splash Body Mist is proudly not tested on animals, ensuring a guilt-free indulgence in its captivating fragrance.



Long-lasting freshness: The Floral Splash Body Mist is designed to provide long-lasting freshness, keeping you feeling revitalized and enchanting for hours.
Immersive experience: Immerse yourself in the refreshing allure of Floral Splash Body Mist, letting its captivating fragrance transport you to a tropical paradise, wherever you may be.

Title: Urban Desire Body Mist 150ML
Description:
Travel-friendly size: The Urban Desire Body Mist comes in a convenient 150 ml travel size, perfect for on-the-go enchantment.
Enchanting fragrance: Experience the magic of the Urban Desire Body Mist with its captivating blend of notes, including pepper, mandarin, bergamot, and geranium.
Timeless and graceful: The fragrance of the Urban Desire Body Mist evokes a sense of elegance and grace, making it a perfect choice for any occasion.
Charming aura: Elevate your aura with the charm of the Urban Desire Body Mist, leaving a delicate and enchanting trail wherever you go.
Refreshing mist: Spritz on the Urban Desire Body Mist for a refreshing burst of fragrance that revitalizes your senses and uplifts your mood.
Long-lasting scent: Enjoy the lingering scent of Urban Desire throughout the day, as the Urban Desire Body Mist is designed to provide long-lasting fragrance.
Versatile application: Use the Urban Desire Body Mist on your body, hair, or even as a room spray, creating a beautifully scented environment wherever you desire.
Lightweight formula: The body mist features a lightweight formula that is non-greasy and quickly absorbs into the skin, leaving it feeling nourished and refreshed.
Unleash your inner enchantment: Let the Urban Desire Body Mist transport you to a world of enchantment, where the fragrance of Urban Desire wraps you in a captivating embrace.

Title: Tropical Fling body Mist 150ml
Description: Tropical Fling Body Mist is a sparkling and breezy fragrance with vibrant fruity-floral scent with clean and crisp elements of wild Orchids & Wormwood, which evokes the spirit of sun-kissed sand and beachy adventures. Bryan & Candy, Tropical Fling Fragrance Body Mist, gives you the confidence to slay with a look and steal someone’s heart with a smile.

Title: Nottie Berries body Mist 150ml
Description: A refreshing berrylicious fragrance with a blend of candied berries like blueberry and cranberry crush, adds vibrancy to the fragrance. Bryan & Candy’s, Nottie Berries Fragrance Mist celebrates the bubbly, mischievous, playful, cheerful, vibrant you. A good fragrance for occasions like family and friends get-togethers, reunion, meetups and pajama parties.

Title: Wild Salsa Fragrance Mist  150ml
Description:
Experience the exhilarating blend of "Wild Salsa" fragrance, designed to ignite your senses and unleash your passion for life.
Vibrant notes of cantaloupe, orange, pear, and lemon create a refreshing and invigorating aroma that will leave you feeling energized.
Let the tropical scent of cantaloupe transport you to a paradise of sun-soaked beaches and lush greenery.
The burst of orange adds a zesty twist to the fragrance, awakening your senses and adding a touch of excitement.
Pear brings a delightful sweetness to the blend, adding depth and creating a harmonious balance with the other notes.
Lemon invigorates the fragrance, infusing it with a vibrant and uplifting quality that will uplift your mood.
Immerse yourself in the spirited allure of "Wild Salsa" and embrace the vibrant energy it brings to your day.
The long-lasting formula ensures that you can enjoy the captivating scent of "Wild Salsa" throughout the day or evening.
Travel-friendly size allows you to take the refreshing and spirited allure of "Wild Salsa" with you wherever you go.

Title: My Escapade Body Mist 150ml
Description: My Escapade Body Mist  Elevate your senses and embark on a journey of sensory delight with this enchanting body mist.Unleash the magic of this body mist and make each day a new adventure in indulgence. Experience the essence of "My Escapade" and make it an integral part of your daily routine.

Title: Naked Sunshine Body Mist 150ml
Description: Naked Sunshine Body Mist  – a radiant invitation to embrace the warmth of the sun and the beauty of your natural self.Evoke the spirit of sunlit days and feel the embrace of "Naked Sunshine" whenever you desire a touch of nature's elegance. Make this body mist an integral part of your self-care routine and celebrate the beauty that comes from embracing your true self.
